overview: This DVD includes: -Max and Ruby's Perfect Pumpkin -Max's Jack O'Lantern -Max's Big Boo! -Max's Rocket Racer -Max and Morris Blast Off! -Max's Candy Apple -Ruby Delivers -Getting Crabby at the Beach -Max Baby Sits -Max Cleans up -Max's Cuckoo Clock -Ruby's Jewelry Box
title: Max & Ruby's Perfect Pumpkin
